diskManagerClasses

Class FreeBlockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • diskManagerClasses.FreeBlockManager

  • public class FreeBlockManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the free blocks in a DiskUnit.
    Author:
    Jose Antonio Rodriguez Rivera

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FreeBlockManager(DiskUnit dUnit)
      Constructs a free block manager for the given DiskUnit.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFreeBlock()
      Returns the number of a free block (if any).
      void registerFreeBlock(int blockNum)
      Adds a free block to this manager.
      void setInitialFBArray()
      Reads and sets the data needed for this manager.
      java.lang.String showFreeBlocks()
      Shows the free blocks structure.

      • getFreeBlock

        public int getFreeBlock()
                 throws exceptions.FullDiskException
        Returns the number of a free block (if any).
        Returns:
        the number of the free block
        Throws:
        exceptions.FullDiskException - if the DiskUnit does not have any free blocks

      • registerFreeBlock

        public void registerFreeBlock(int blockNum)
                       throws exceptions.InvalidBlockNumberException
        Adds a free block to this manager. (Used when freeing a block).
        Parameters:
        blockNum - the number of the block to mark as free
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidBlockNumberException
